mapper.insert: insert into airbnb_users(user_no, user_name, user_email, user_password, user_birth_date) values(users_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{birthDate})
mapper.update: update airbnb_users set user_name = #{name}, user_email = #{email}, user_password = #{password}, user_phone = #{phone}, user_profile_image = #{profileImage}, user_description = #{description}, user_birth_date = #{birthDate}, user_address = #{address}, user_disabled = #{disabled}, user_host = #{isHost}, user_updated_date = sysdate, user_gender = #{gender} where user_no = #{no}
